DOC.brief_title: Maximum Oxygen Uptake ACL-injured Professional Soccer Players
DOC.detailed_description: The anterior cruciate ligament ( ACL ) rupture consider major injury may affect career professional soccer player . Surgical ACL reconstruction often require treat result knee instability . Although ACL reconstruction consider successful procedure restore knee stability , literature show 55 % participant return competitive sport participation surgery . Soccer player need technical , tactical physical skill succeed , good knee function aerobic capacity . Our purpose evaluate maximum oxygen uptake ( VO2max ) ACL-injured professional soccer player six-month period post-operative rehabilitation , compare control group healthy professional soccer player .
